properties.name: contactId
properties.description: Unique identifier for a particular contact

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: jsonNotice
properties.displayName: See Agile CRM guide to creating filters

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: Object of values to set as described here

options.name: starValue
options.description: Rating of contact (Max value 5). This is not applicable for companies.

options.name: tags
options.description: Unique identifiers added to contact, for easy management of contacts. This is not applicable for companies.
